You are here:

SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
SET UP AND MAINTAIN NET ZERO CLOUD
Configure Net Zero Cloud

Always configure Net Zero Cloud in the specified sequence. Make sure that you have the required licenses and permissions.

REQUIRED EDITIONS
Available in: Lightning Experience
Available in: Enterprise, Performance, Unlimited, and Developer Editions
Set Up Net Zero Cloud Users
Configure user profiles, permission sets, and other security features in your Net Zero Cloud org.
Set Up Access for Your Suppliers, Partners, and Affiliates
Set up roles and permissions so that your stakeholders—suppliers, partners, and affiliates—can upload their sustainability data directly into Net Zero Cloud by using the Experience Cloud site that you create.
Enable Data Pipelines
To use data processing engine definitions to query and compute data available in Salesforce, assign permission sets to users and enable data pipelines.
Enable Net Zero Cloud Features
Let users calculate carbon emissions and generate reports in Net Zero Cloud. You can choose which features to turn on.
Enable Net Zero Cloud Automation
You can automate Net Zero Cloud tasks.
Set Up Energy Use Data Collection
Configure the Collect Energy Use Data flow template to collect energy use data across distributed stakeholders. Customize the template according to your business needs and add the flow to Lightning pages.
SEE ALSO
Trailhead: Lightning Experience Customization
Trailhead: Data Security

title: Configure Net Zero Cloud for Sustainability Data Management
